column1: Uchi////One of the best sushi places I've ever been too.  Similar to sugarfish in LA. My co worker and I were bummed to be seated at the sushi bar
column2: BUT it ended up being an awesome time! The head sushi chef was also our server and he was fantastic. Really made the experience a great one. Highly recommend and will be checking out the Austin location in August!  fried milk is to die for and I would suggest skipping the hot rock (meat)
